after_offset_of: The {{field}} should be after {{argument.0}} from today’s date
alpha_num: The {{field}} should contain letters and numbers only
before: The {{field}} should be a date before {{argument.0}}.
before_offset_of: The {{field}} should be before {{argument.0}} from today’s date
boolean: The {{field}} should be true or false.
date: The {{field}} should be a valid date only (MM/DD/YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY/MM/DD) are allowed
date_format: The {{field}} should be a valid date according to given format {{argument.0}}.
email: The {{field}} should be a valid email address.
ends_with: The {{field}} should end with given letters {{argument.0}}.
in: The {{field}} should fall within defined values {{argument}}.
ip: The {{field}} should be a valid IP address.
ipv4: The {{field}} should be a valid IPV4 address.
ipv6: The {{field}} should be a valid IPV6 address.
json: The {{field}} should be a valid JSON string.
max: The length of {{field}} should not be more than {{argument.0}}.
min: The length of {{field}} should not be less than {{argument.0}}.
not_in: The {{field}} should not be one of {{argument}}.
object: The {{field}} should be a valid OBJECT.
range: The {{field}} should be inside defined range of {{argument.0}}.
between: The {{field}} should be inside defined range of {{argument.0}}.
required_when: The {{field}} is required when value is the same as {{argument.0}}
required_with_all: The {{field}} is required when all of {{argument}} is present.
required_with_any: The {{field}} is required when any of {{argument}} is present.
required_without_all: The {{field}} is required when none of {{argument}} are present.
required_without_any: The {{field}} is required when any of {{argument}} is present.
starts_with: The {{field}} should starts with given letters {{argument.0}}.
url: The {{field}} should be a valid url.
